desc: A Place to buy Natural Edible Clays, chalks and slate pencils in different colours, sizes, textures and tastes. From Earthy, crunchy, gummy, hard, soft, gritty to smooth & plain n pure clays. Some even have fine touches like roasted or smoked for even more taste. Clay Types, Retail and Wholesale. worldwide clay seller

layout.text: Natural edible clay chunks have unique wellness and healing properties. Extracted and Roasted Exclusively.
